DataElement.preferredName: Minimum Requirement Peripheral Whole Blood Biospecimen Collection CPTAC Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to indicate whether it is likely that the minimum required peripheral whole blood can be collected.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Minimum Requirement Peripheral Whole Blood Biospecimen Collection
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The smallest possible quantity._Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory._Blood that has not been separated into its various components; blood that has not been modified except for the addition of an anticoagulant._The act or process of gathering biospecimens for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The smallest possible quantity.:Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.:Blood that has not been separated into its various components; blood that has not been modified except for the addition of an anticoagulant.

Property.preferredDefinition: The act or process of gathering biospecimens for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes.
